message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn, how about a 55/45 split?
Come on, Bob, 58-42 is still a good deal considering the inflation!
The inflation is hitting you harder than me, Alice. Let's be realistic. 60/40?
I'm still willing to compromise, Bob. 56-44 is a fair deal considering the inflation!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Time is running out and the value is plummeting. Take 375,000 or leave it.
I'm still holding out for a better deal, Bob. 54-46 is the best I can do!
